title: Request to Address Vulnerability CVE-2024-270
body:
### Describe the bug

I am reaching out to bring to your attention a vulnerability that has been identified in the Quarkus repository.

Vulnerability Details:

CVE Identifier: CVE-2024-2700
Severity: HIGH

I would like to inquire about the impact of this vulnerability on the Quarkus framework. Specifically, I am interested to know if this vulnerability affects all users of Quarkus or if it is limited to specific configurations or use cases.

Furthermore, I would like to inquire if the Quarkus team has plans to address this vulnerability in an upcoming release. If so, I would appreciate any information regarding the timeline for the release of the fix.


### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_
